teamAnnotation: 1st overall draft pick Kyrie Irving signs with the Cleveland Cavaliers

playerAnnotation: LeBron James and the Miami Heat are defeated in five games (4-1) by the San Antonio Spurs in the NBA finals
LeBron James announces intention to sign with the Cleveland Cavaliers

teamAnnotation: 1st overall draft pick Andrew Wiggins is part of three-team trade made to the Minnesota Timberwolves for Kevin Love
Cavaliers report that Kyrie Irving will miss rest of the NBA Finals series due to foot injury
Cavaliers lose to the Golden State Warriors in Game of 5 of the 2015 NBA Finals
Tyronn Lue replaces David Blatt as the head coach
The Golden State Warriors win Game 1 and Game 2. The pressure is on for the Cavaliers to win the next game
Cavaliers need to win Game 5 to keep playing in the Finals

playerAnnotation: LeBron James wins Finals MVP for the 3rd time as the Cavaliers beat the Golden State Warriors 4-3 to win the 2016 NBA Finals
